description:
The All Day News reporter, Koshimizu, is trying to dig out the dirt of Kurokan. He goes to Hitomi`s clinic wanting to prove Kurokan`s rumors, but she denies the rumors. 
While Kurokan is working part-time to afford Sakamoto`s salary, Hitomi visits and tells him about Koshimizu and that he inadvertently mentioned that he knew the coach of Keiyo High School. 
Kurokan asks Koshimizu to assist with organizing a practice game with Keiyo shows Keiyo a video tape of Sakamoto pitching.
Source: crunchyroll
